row.process:
:SET &command# = 'java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#dm-tool.jar rm GetDynamicProperty -u "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" ' :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-un "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" -p "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ') :SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#,'-on "&UC4RB_RM_OBJ_NAME#" -n "&UC4RB_RM_NAME#" ')
:IF &UC4RB_RM_OBJ_TYPE# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-ot "&UC4RB_RM_OBJ_TYPE#" ') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_NAMESPACE# <> "" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-ns "&UC4RB_RM_NAMESPACE#" ') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_RM_FAIL_MISSING# = "YES" : SET &command# = STR_CAT(&command#, '-fm') :ENDIF &command#
